projects.name: Bike Store
projects.title: Full-Stack Bike Shop Application
projects.description: A full-stack web application for browsing, purchasing, and managing bikes. Features include user registration, role-based access (Admin/User), product management, SurjoPay payment integration, order tracking, and a responsive design. Built with TypeScript, Express.js, MongoDB, and React.

projects.name: BasaFinder
projects.title: Smart Rental & Housing Solution
projects.description: A full-stack rental platform with dashboards for Admin, Landlord, and Tenant. Includes features like property listing, booking, approval workflow, Stripe payment integration, and JWT authentication.

projects.name: Tourist Guide
projects.title: Travel Companion Web App
projects.description: An interactive travel planning app with destination listings, guide bookings, and admin panel features. Built using MERN stack with secure user authentication.
